communities.description: A list of community details including name, pricing, location, amenities, HOA information, headline, description, and contact information.

name.description: The name of the community, often including its sales status.

from_the.description: Pricing information for the homes in the community.

hoa_name.description: The name of the Homeowners Association (HOA) managing the community.

hoa_yearly_fee.description: The yearly fee required by the HOA.

city.description: The city where the community is located.

zip.description: The ZIP code for the community's location.

county.description: The county where the community is situated.

headline.description: A brief headline describing the type of homes available in the community.

description.description: A detailed description of the community, including location benefits and nearby amenities.

model_home_phone.description: The contact phone number for the model home.

amenities_photos.description: A list of photos showcasing the community's amenities.

items.description: The name or description of the amenity shown in the photo.

state.description: The state where the community is located.

homes_mir.description: A list of move-in ready homes, including their address, size, number of bedrooms and bathrooms, garage details, unique features, and any special offers.

address.description: The address of the move-in ready home.

city.description: The city where the home is located.

zip.description: The ZIP code for the homeâ€™s location.

square_feet.description: The total square footage of the home.

bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms in the home.

bathrooms.description: The number of full bathrooms in the home.

half_baths.description: The number of half bathrooms in the home.

garage.description: The number of garage spaces available with the home.

stories.description: The number of stories in the home.

description.description: A detailed description of the home's layout and features.

unique_features.description: Specific standout features of the home.

floor_plan.description: The name of the floor plan for the home.

floorplan_type.description: The type of home based on the floor plan (e.g., Townhome).

community.description: The community to which the home belongs.

special1.description: Special promotional offer related to the home.

special2.description: Another special offer or promotion available for the home.

homes_rtb.description: A list of ready-to-build homes with detailed descriptions, size, number of bedrooms and bathrooms, unique features, and customization options.

description.description: A detailed description of the ready-to-build home, including layout and available customizations.

bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms in the home.

bathrooms.description: The number of full bathrooms in the home.

half_baths.description: The number of half bathrooms in the home.

square_feet.description: The total square footage of the home.

garage.description: The number of garage spaces available with the home.

stories.description: The number of stories in the home.

unique_features.description: Specific standout features of the home.

floor_plan.description: The name of the floor plan for the home.

community.description: The community to which the home belongs.

division.description: Information about the housing division, including its name, subheadline, introductory text, description, and highlights of the area.

intro.description: An introductory text about the division.

description.description: A detailed description of the division, including its location and benefits.

highlights.description: A list of highlights and notable features of the area within the division.

name.description: The name of the highlight or notable feature.

description.description: A detailed description of the highlight or notable feature.
